title: Another case of Loldrop?
body: As title says, disconnected and the match doesn't show on the history, this is the screen from lolskill, this happened after I (nami) got a doublekill on bot, the time is 14/08/2017 around 17:30.

replies.body: It sounds like you probably just encountered a game crashing on the server. When this happens, the game disappears entirely from the servers which is why you wouldn't ever be able to reconnect. Everyone else was probably booted from the game, no one will be given penalties, and you should all be able to requeue as normal.
